name: LondonTramTimes
0:
”Alexa, ask tram times for the next tram”
”Alexa, ask tram times for the next tram from East Croydon”
”Alexa, ask tram times next tram at Mitcham”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tram times
des:
Ask this skill for the next tram from a Tramlink stop in London. The stop is saved, after than just ask for 'next tram'. The skill uses the live arrivals feed from TfL and will read them out.

For example, you can ask for "next tram from Addiscombe". After that, just ask for the "next tram" to get the Addiscombe arrivals again.

More info about saved results:
• The stop you last asked for is saved
• Ask for 'next stop' and the saved information from the previous query is used
• Ask to forget the stop and the stored stop will be cleared. Subsequent enquiries will then also ask for the stop without saving it
• Ask to reset the settings, and the original behaviour is restored

Known issues:
Stops at the end of the line don't always get results as the feed from TfL doesn't include scheduled departures.

Notes about the data used: The arrivals data is supplied by TfL Open Data: "Contains OS data © Crown copyright and database rights 2016 and Geomni UK Map data © and database rights 2019."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
